name: Student Progress Report
prompt_template:
Analyze {student_name}'s progress over the last {time_period}. Include:
1. Lessons completed and topics covered
2. Practice session frequency and duration
3. Songs learned and current status
4. Areas of strength
5. Areas needing improvement
6. Recommendations for next steps

Context: {student_context}
description: Generate comprehensive progress reports for students

name: Lesson Plan Generator
prompt_template:
Create a detailed lesson plan for teaching {song_name} to a {skill_level} student.

Include:
1. Warm-up exercises (5-10 min)
2. Song introduction and analysis
3. Step-by-step teaching progression
4. Practice exercises
5. Assignment for home practice
6. Tips for common challenges

Student background: {student_background}
Lesson duration: {duration} minutes
description: Generate structured lesson plans for specific songs and skill levels

name: Practice Plan Generator
prompt_template:
Create a personalized practice plan for {student_name} focusing on {focus_areas}.

Current skill level: {skill_level}
Practice time available: {practice_time} minutes per day
Current songs: {current_songs}
Goals: {goals}

Provide:
1. Daily practice routine breakdown
2. Specific exercises for each focus area
3. Time allocation for each activity
4. Progress milestones
5. Tips for effective practice

name: Encouragement Email
Assignment Feedback
description: Generate constructive feedback for completed assignments
